International Conference on Transforming
Online Education

About the Conference

The Indian Institute of Management Kashipur, in collaboration with the Earl V. Snyder Innovation Management Center, Whitman School of Management, Syracuse University, USA, proudly presents the International Conference on ‘Digital Transformation: Leapfrogging into the Future’.

Digital transformation is revolutionizing industries, economies, and societies globally. It fosters entrepreneurship, innovation, and a tech-driven future by integrating AI, Blockchain, IoT, Big Data, AR/VR, and sustainable technologies.

This conference will bring together researchers, industry leaders, academia, and policymakers to explore cutting-edge advancements and their impact on business agility, market disruption, and sustainability.

Join us in shaping the future of digital transformation and driving innovation for a smarter, more connected world!
